pages.text: A large machine that burns fuel to heat up water to produce steam $(br2)Right click steam boiler with solid fuel firebox or liquid fuel firebox to indicate fuel type.

The production of steam starts at 100C. The production is proportional to temperature when greater than 100C. When boilers reaches 320C it reaches 100% efficiency (78 water -> 390 steam), 160C will be 50% efficiency (39 water -> 195 steam)
